labels.shortDescription: Error when selecting a cross-object fieldsset is not allowed and attempted.
labels.value: Cross-object fields not allowed and field "{0}" is a cross-object field.

labels.shortDescription: Presented when attempting to create a subquery from an invalid relationship.
labels.value: Invalid call to subselectQuery. Invalid relationship for table.
